mainboard.name: Dreadmalkin
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.

mainboard.name: Beacon of Unrest
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: Merfolk Looter
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

mainboard.name: Acolyte of Affliction
mainboard.oracle_text: When Acolyte of Affliction enters the battlefield, mill two cards, then you may return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Gomazoa
mainboard.oracle_text:
Defender, flying
{T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle.

mainboard.name: Stitcher's Supplier
mainboard.oracle_text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

mainboard.name: Reclamation Sage
mainboard.oracle_text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Mesmeric Fiend
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Hinterland Harbor
mainboard.oracle_text:
Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

mainboard.name: Doomgape
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

mainboard.name: Drowned Catacomb
mainboard.oracle_text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Whisper Agent
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Turn to Mist
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

mainboard.name: Mana Leak
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

mainboard.name: River Kelpie
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card.
Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

mainboard.name: Unearth
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Siren Stormtamer
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.

mainboard.name: Uncharted Haven
mainboard.oracle_text:
Uncharted Haven enters the battlefield tapped.
As Uncharted Haven enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

mainboard.name: Jungle Hollow
mainboard.oracle_text:
Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

mainboard.name: Fact or Fiction
mainboard.oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Vineglimmer Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

mainboard.name: Deathsprout
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Eternal Witness
mainboard.oracle_text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: The Long Reach of Night // Animus of Night's Reach
Daring Saboteur
mainboard.oracle_text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

mainboard.name: Pharika's Spawn
mainboard.oracle_text:
Escape—{5}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Pharika's Spawn escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it enters the battlefield this way, each opponent sacrifices a non-Gorgon creature.

mainboard.name: Tilling Treefolk
mainboard.oracle_text: When Tilling Treefolk enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
